meanings.definition: The elected head of a republic or country.
meanings.sent1: In the United States, the presidents serve as the leaders of the nation.
meanings.sent2: Many countries around the world have presidents as their head of state.
meanings.sent3: The presidents of the student council organized a fun school event.
meanings.sent4: She was like the president of the family, making decisions for everyone.
meanings.sent5: The presidents of the club were responsible for planning the annual fundraiser.

meanings.definition: A person who presides over a meeting or event.
meanings.sent1: During the conference, the presidents ensured that the discussions stayed on track.
meanings.sent2: The president of the chess club led the tournament with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The presidents of the book club made sure everyone had a chance to share their favorite reads.
meanings.sent4: As the president of the debate team, she skillfully moderated the intense arguments.
meanings.sent5: The presidents of the neighborhood watch meeting kept the discussions focused on community safety.
